name: Pac-Manic Miner Man
summary: Pac-Manic Miner Man was written in 2012 by Jim Bagley to run the classic ZX Spectrum Game Manic Miner on Pac-Man Arcade hardware, a long time ambition of his was to write an arcade game on arcade hardware but little did he know he would eventually write a game that would run on Pac-Man hardware. After finding the memory map for Pac-Man he decided the opportunity was too good to miss and as a tribute to the classic ZX Spectrum game he wrote Pac-Manic Miner Man as it fit the constraints of the hardware.
